ru.tehkode.permissions

Interface NativeInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionsEx

    public interface NativeInterface
    Various mappings for UUID handling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void callEvent(PermissionEvent event)
      Calls an event on the server
      UUID getServerUUID()
      Return the UUID associated with this server Mostly used internally
      boolean isOnline(UUID uuid)
      Returns whether the player associated with this uuid is online
      UUID nameToUUID(String name)
      Returns the UUID associated with a name.
      String UUIDToName(UUID uid)
      Converts a uuid to a name.

    • Method Detail

      • UUIDToName

        String UUIDToName(UUID uid)
        Converts a uuid to a name. Preferably as minimally blocking as possible.
        Parameters:
        uid - The UUID to convert to a name
        Returns:
        The name associated with a UUID, or null if unknown

      • nameToUUID

        UUID nameToUUID(String name)
        Returns the UUID associated with a name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to convert
        Returns:
        The UUID associated with this name, or null if unknown

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline(UUID uuid)
        Returns whether the player associated with this uuid is online
        Parameters:
        uuid - The uuid to check
        Returns:
        Whether this uuid is online

      • getServerUUID

        UUID getServerUUID()
        Return the UUID associated with this server Mostly used internally
        Returns:
        This server's uuid

      • callEvent

        void callEvent(PermissionEvent event)
        Calls an event on the server
        Parameters:
        event - The event to call
